title: Braže to UN: 'No-one is safe from Russia’s imperial ambitions'
summary_full: Latvian Foreign Minister Baiba Braže addressed the United Nations General Assembly in New York on 24th February 2026, exactly four years since Russia launched its failed full-scale invasion of Ukraine.
summary_public: Latvian Foreign Minister Baiba Braže addressed the United Nations General Assembly in New York on 24th February 2026, exactly four years since Russia launched its failed full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

LV.label: negative
LV.evidence: No-one is safe from Russia’s imperial ambitions

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Russia launched its failed full-scale invasion of Ukraine
